grails.plugin.multitenant.core
Interface TenantRepository

All Known Subinterfaces:
CurrentTenantAwareRepository
public interface TenantRepository

Most applications will probably provide an implementation of this interface. Having this contract makes it possible to look up tenant instances across plugins and applications in a type safe way.

Author:
Kim A. Betti

Method Summary
 Tenant findByTenantId(Integer tenantId)
          Look up a tenant instance associated with a given id.
 

Method Detail

findByTenantId

Tenant findByTenantId(Integer tenantId)
                      throws TenantNotFoundException
Look up a tenant instance associated with a given id.

Parameters:
tenantId - This will often be a database PK
Returns:
The tenant instance associated with the tenant id
Throws:
TenantNotFoundException
